description: Pea and mint is a classic with the addition of zucchinis for extra greens and spring flavour.
name: Pea, Zucchini & Mint Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep saucepan on medium low heat and gently cook the leeks for 3-4 minutes, add the potatoes and garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in in the stock, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes until the potatoes are tender. Stir in the zucchini and peas and cook for 5-6 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat, stir in the mint leaves and blend well with an immersion blender, until smooth.
